verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David שְׁמַע־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> O God קוֹלִ֣י <S%H6963><s%> my voice בְשִׂיחִ֑י <S%H7879><s%> in my prayer מִפַּ֥חַד <S%H6343><s%> from fear א֝וֹיֵ֗ב <S%H341><s%> of the enemy תִּצֹּ֥ר <S%H5341><s%> preserve חַיָּֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> my life

תַּ֭סְתִּירֵנִי <S%H5641><s%> Hide מִסּ֣וֹד <S%H5475><s%> me from the secret counsel מְרֵעִ֑ים <S%H7489><s%> of the wicked מֵ֝רִגְשַׁ֗ת <S%H7285><s%> from the insurrection פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> of the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> of iniquity

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Who שָׁנְנ֣וּ <S%H8150><s%> Who whet כַחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> like a sword לְשׁוֹנָ֑ם <S%H3956><s%> their tongue דָּרְכ֥וּ <S%H1869><s%> [and] bend חִ֝צָּ֗ם <S%H2671><s%> [their bows to shoot] their arrows דָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> words מָֽר׃ <S%H4751><s%> [even] bitter

לִיר֣וֹת <S%H3384><s%> That they may shoot בַּמִּסְתָּרִ֣ים <S%H4565><s%> in secret תָּ֑ם <S%H8535><s%> at the perfect פִּתְאֹ֥ם <S%H6597><s%> suddenly יֹ֝רֻ֗הוּ <S%H3384><s%> do they shoot וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִירָֽאוּ׃ <S%H3372><s%> at him and fear

יְחַזְּקוּ־ <S%H2388><s%> They encourage לָ֨מוֹ ׀ דָּ֘בָ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> matter רָ֗ע <S%H7451><s%> themselves [in] an evil יְֽ֭סַפְּרוּ <S%H5608><s%> they commune לִטְמ֣וֹן <S%H2934><s%> privily מוֹקְשִׁ֑ים <S%H4170><s%> snares אָ֝מְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> they say מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who יִרְאֶה־ <S%H7200><s%> Who shall see לָּֽמוֹ׃

יַֽחְפְּֽשׂוּ־ <S%H2664><s%> They search out עוֹלֹ֗ת <S%H5766><s%> iniquities תַּ֭מְנוּ <S%H8552><s%> they accomplish חֵ֣פֶשׂ <S%H2664><s%> a diligent מְחֻפָּ֑שׂ <S%H2665><s%> search וְקֶ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> both the inward אִ֝֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [thought] of every one וְלֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> [of them] and the heart עָמֹֽק׃ <S%H6013><s%> [is] deep

וַיֹּרֵ֗ם <S%H3384><s%> shall shoot אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> But God חֵ֥ץ <S%H2671><s%> at them [with] an arrow פִּתְא֑וֹם <S%H6597><s%> suddenly הָ֝י֗וּ <S%H1961><s%> become מַכּוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4347><s%> shall they be wounded

וַיַּכְשִׁיל֣וּהוּ <S%H3782><s%> to fall עָלֵ֣ימוֹ <S%H5921><s%> is against לְשׁוֹנָ֑ם <S%H3956><s%> So they shall make their own tongue יִ֝תְנֹדֲד֗וּ <S%H5074><s%> them shall flee away כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All רֹ֥אֵה <S%H7200><s%> upon themselves all that see בָֽם׃

וַיִּֽירְא֗וּ <S%H3372><s%> shall fear כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אָ֫דָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> And all men וַ֭יַּגִּידוּ <S%H5046><s%> and shall declare פֹּ֥עַל <S%H6467><s%> the work אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God וּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֥הוּ <S%H4639><s%> of his doing הִשְׂכִּֽילוּ׃ <S%H7919><s%> for they shall wisely consider

יִשְׂמַ֬ח <S%H8055><s%> shall be glad צַדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> The righteous בַּ֭יהוָה <S%H3069><s%> God וְחָ֣סָה <S%H2620><s%> and shall trust ב֑וֹ וְ֝יִתְהַֽלְל֗וּ <S%H1984><s%> shall glory כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׁרֵי־ <S%H3477><s%> in him and all the upright לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> in heart
